FileFormat.FormatDescription: NeoDisk icon file format is associated with the NeoDesk graphical environment, developed by Gribnif Software, for the Atari ST family of computers. Three versions of NeoDesk icon files exist. This is the third version which is identified by the signature that begins with ASCII '.NIC'.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF:'.NIC' followed by 0x03 (end of text) followed by 0x00 (null) followed by ';NeoDesk Icon File format, Copyright Â½ 1990 Gribnif Software'
